page.title: 11Notable Events in Loughton
page.content: Presto has opened making many small {shops}close down.Even the Co-op had to shut down because of Presto. The council has made new pavements out of brick so it's easier to walk on. Also new parking spaces have been made. Next to the swimming pool a new{meals {on wheels}centre is being made.As well as being the kitchens it's also a restaurant where old people can come and pop in for a bite to eat. Two{motorways}have been built, the M11 and the M25. They were built to stop the lorries driving along the little roads. The teachers strikes have been affecting{schools}with many children having days off, and because of falling roles in primary schools one of the local secondary schools will have to close.
